law.catch_line: Fiscal court as board of supervisors on discontinuance of soil conservation district.
law.text: If any supervising soil conservation district is discontinued, the fiscal court of the county or counties involved shall serve in the same supervising capacity over the watershed conservancy district as the board of supervisors.
law.history: Created 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 203, sec. 20, effective May 18, 1956.
